article_title: Netanyahu says Israel to attend Gaza ceasefire talks
sentence: Hamas  invaded  southern  Israel  on  7  October  last  year,  killing  more  than  1,200  people,  mostly  Israelis,  and  taking  251  people  hostage.

article_title: Netanyahu says Israel to attend Gaza ceasefire talks
sentence: The  Hamas-run  health  ministry  says  that  more  than  39,000  people  have  been  killed  in  Israel's  military  response  in  Gaza.
